get_pods: get list of pods available to selected account
delete_pod:
delete the pod. Requires user confirmation
Format: delete_pod <pod_id>
set_pod_perms:
sets the permissions on a pod
Format: set_pod_perms <pod_id> -u <username to give perms> -L <permission level>
delete_pod_perms:
deletes the permissions for the selected user
Format: delete_pod_perms <pod_id> -u <user to take perms from>
get_perms:
gets a list of permissions for a pod
Format: get_perms <pod_id>
